main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified objects in Napa, California on 15 April 1952 and August 15, 1952.
interesting points: The sightings included a bright light moving in a straight line at speeds of 600-1000 MPH, The object was observed by both naked eye and ground radar, Aircraft were present in the area during the sightings, The reporting agency noted possible explanations including ballistic missile, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena, Visibility was good and weather conditions were clear during the observations.
sighted object: bright light, possibly a missile or aircraft
witness description: Diane Robinson, observer reported an object moving at high speed
